But it is how things works, the personal data are handled by companies, like banks, google/gmail, social networks etc. Businessman, companies, governments - none is reliable. Even maybe we can not relly on open source apps like Zeronet. What if there is a bug that will allow to identify users and track their behavior on zeronet or even break the encryption of personal data like zeromail contents? I do not know, not a techie.
